verses.roman:
śrī-rūpa-upare prabhura yata kṛpā haila
atyanta vistāra-kathā saṅkṣepe kahila

synonyms: śrī-rūpa-upare—upon Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yata—as much; kṛpā—mercy; haila—there was; atyanta—very much; vistāra-kathā—elaborate topic; saṅkṣepe—in brief; kahila—I have described.
translation: Much mercy was thus bestowed upon Śrī Ra Gosvāmī, and I have briefly described all those topics.
